value.author: John Lennon
value.quote: Creativity is a gift. It doesn’t come through if the air is cluttered.

value.author: Rumi
value.quote: What you seek is seeking you.

value.author: Jack Johnson
value.quote: What about your mind, does it shine? Are there things that concern you more than your time? [...] Gone people all awkward with their things, gone.

value.author: Native Indian
value.quote: Listen to the wind, it talks. Listen to the silence, it speaks. Listen to your heart, it knows.

value.author: Dalai Lama
value.quote: Do not confuse peace of mind with spaced-out insensitivity. A truly peaceful mind is very sensitive, very aware.

value.author: B.K.S. Iyengar
value.quote: Food is Brahman.

value.author: Gautama Buddha
value.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.

value.author: Bruce Lee
value.quote: Empty your mind, be formless. Shapeless, like water. [...] Be water, my friend.

value.author: Elisabeth Kübler-Ross
value.quote: Spiritual growth is the sole purpose of our life here on earth.

value.author: Dalai Lama
value.quote: For the individual, one truth or one religion is essential, [...] it is very important to make clear that all religious traditions have the same message: love, compassion and contentment.

value.author: John Lennon
value.quote: Love is the greatest refreshment in life.

value.author: Rumi
value.quote: There is a voice that doesn’t use words. Listen.

value.author: Dakpo Tashi Namgyal
value.quote: Brighten your awareness and remain shining like a flame.

value.author: Dakpo Tashi Namgyal
value.quote: Expand your mindfulness and remain pervasive like the earth.

value.author: Zen Master
value.quote: The plants, they just don't scream as loud.

value.author: Osho
value.quote: If you love a flower, don’t pick it up. Because if you pick it up it dies and it ceases to be what you love. So if you love a flower, let it be.

value.author: John Lennon
value.quote: If we cannot love ourselves, we cannot fully open to our ability to love others or our potential to create.

value.author: Patanjali
value.quote: Progress in meditation comes swiftly for those who try their hardest.

value.author: Rumi
value.quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.

value.author: Democritus
value.quote: To a wise man, the whole earth is open, because the true country of a virtuous soul is the entire universe.

value.author: Dalai Lama
value.quote: If you don't love yourself, you cannot love others. You will not be able to love others. If you have no compassion for yourself then you are not able of developing compassion for others.

value.author: Rumi
value.quote: When you do things from your soul, you feel a river moving in you, a joy.

value.author: Rumi
value.quote: Beyond right and wrong, there is a field. I will meet you there.

value.author: Rumi
value.quote: Silence is the language of god, all else is poor translation.

value.author: Mother Teresa
value.quote: Every time you smile at someone it is an action of love, a gift to that person, a beautiful thing.

value.author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart
value.quote: The music is not in the notes but in the silence between them.

value.author: John Lennon
value.quote: We need to learn to love ourselves first, in all our glory and our imperfections.

value.author: Dalai Lama
value.quote: Sometimes one creates a dynamic impression by saying something, and sometimes one creates as significant an impression by remaining silent.

value.author: John Lennon
value.quote: There are two basic motivating forces: fear and love. When we are afraid, we pull back from life.

value.author: Rumi
value.quote: I want to sing like the birds sing, not worrying about who hears or what they think.

value.author: Rabindranath Tagore
value.quote: Love is the ultimate truth at the heart of creation.

value.author: Dalai Lama
value.quote: I find hope in the darkest of days, and focus in the brightest. I do not judge the universe.

value.author: Dalai Lama
value.quote: The way to overcome negative thoughts and destructive emotions is to develop opposing, positive emotions that are stronger and more powerful.

value.author: Dakpo Tashi Namgyal
value.quote: Elevate your experience and remain wide-open like the sky.

value.author: Rumi
value.quote: If you are irritated by every rub, how will your mirror be polished?

value.author: Jeffrey Armstrong

citation.title: Karma: The Ancient Science of Cause and Effect

value.quote: We are preprogrammed and reprogrammable

value.author: John Lennon
value.quote: Evolution and all hopes for a better world rest in the fearlessness and open-hearted vision of people who embrace life.

value.author: Osho
value.quote: Truth is not something outside to be discovered, it is something inside to be realized.

value.author: Dalai Lama
value.quote: If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.

value.author: Gautama Buddha
value.quote: Happiness does not depend on what you have or who you are, it solely relies on what you think.

value.author: John Lennon
value.quote: Love is a flower you got to let it grow.

value.author: Swami Sivananda
value.quote: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.

value.author: John Lennon
value.quote: When you do something beautiful and nobody noticed, do not be sad. For the sun, every morning is a beautiful spectacle and yet most of the audience still sleeps.

value.author: Max Ehrmann
value.quote: Go placidly amid the noise and the haste, and remember what peace there may be in silence.

value.author: Dalai Lama
value.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.

value.author: Max Ehrmann
value.quote: Beyond a wholesome discipline, be gentle with yourself. You are a child of the universe no less than the trees and the stars; you have a right to be here.

value.author: John Lennon
value.quote: It matters not who you love, where you love, why you love, when you love or how you love, it matters only that you love.

value.author: Rumi
value.quote: There are a thousand ways to kneel and kiss the earth.

value.author: Leo Tolstoy
value.quote: Happiness does not depend on outward things, but on the way we see them.

value.author: Dag Hammarskjöld
value.quote: Our ideas about death define how we live our lives.

value.author: John Lennon
value.quote: I can’t wake you up. You can wake you up. I can’t cure you. You can cure you.

value.author: Rumi
value.quote: Sell your cleverness and buy bewilderment.

value.author: Dalai Lama
value.quote: Spend some time alone every day.

value.author: Lao Tzu
value.quote: Empty of desire, perceive mystery. Filled with desire, perceive manifestations.

value.author: Dalai Lama
value.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.

value.author: Rumi
value.quote: Raise your words, not voice. It is rain that grows flowers, not thunder.

value.author: Kahil Gibran
value.quote: You give but little when you give of your possessions. It is when you give of yourself that you truly give.

value.author: Albert Einstein
value.quote: Everything in life is vibration.

author: Mantak Chia
Tao Huang

citation.title: The Secret Teachings of the Tao Te Ching

value.quote: Contentment arises from non-attachment.

value.author: Dakpo Tashi Namgyal
value.quote: Steady your attention and remain unshakable like a mountain.

value.author: Dakpo Tashi Namgyal
value.quote: Clear your thoughtfree wakefulness and remain lucid like a crystal.

value.author: John Wooden
value.quote: Make each day your masterpiece.
